title: Attempting to Reconnect
body: Am i the only one that can't log onto league right now, and recently i have been getting alot of ping and keep disconnecting from the profile when idling.

replies.body:
Hey folks,

Were aware of some issues and taking a look into it at the moment.

If you're having problems - what ISP are you with?

Cheers
-Mindstar
I'm with TPG, thanks.
i'm with TPG, now i cannot connect to league at all thanks.
TPG

Thanks for the responses...  It looks like there are some wider internet issues at the moment being worked on by a few ISPs and backbone providers.  We've not yet been able to confirm what the root cause of this is, but so far based on what we can see online, it does seem to be affecting access to multiple online services (not just League).

If I find out anything more I'll keep you posted

Cheers
-Mindstar
Should I call TPG for you mate? Whats the update?
Spark NZ

Battle.net is down too. It's been officially declared down, so it's not just a provider. 
But remember that TPG is a sub-contractor of  Telstra, so unless TPG really fucked up or telstra is capping them again. it's not either of their problems (if it's the latter telstra should still be getting connection, which doesn't consistently seem to be the case).

Dunno what really is going on, but it was suspected that battlenet was recovering from a dDos, so either way, we'll just have to wait. FIX IT SOON PLZ!

(with TPG friend with telstra, both having problems.)
2nd Update: it's working, but I wouldn't recommend ranked... or relying on the system tonight. GLHF
Update: I am in! no problems yet. seems a little laggy though (doing my own custom)

Update - I've managed to lose 3 lp for "dodging" a ranked game. I've managed to reconnect to league and i "yolo'd" it into a game.
wish me luck
TPG just logged in hopefully i dont lo LP for d/c

I have had the same problem, including being unable to log into other game servers as well. It seems that the problem is with the latest Windows update. I restored my system to 2 restore points ago, and now I can log into league again.
i can logon now too.... for the moment
Sorry to sound rude, but its not the windows update, for once rito didnt goof. Its our ISP thats causing this problem atm, Namely TPG and Telstra
Thought it was a problem with my internet so i restarted and joined a ranked game got disconnected in champion select again and now i'm -13LP. Top job tpg.
TPG here too
internode :/ cant login right now, always get huge ping spikes at peak times (7-10pm)
Bump

Also on a sidenote, even though this is not of your concern, battle.net does not seem to work either, might have something to do with tpg for all gaming services. Only thing that seems to work that is gaming related is steam.
the battlenet one seems to be mostly Telstra

Same here, on negative 13 lp because i thought it was my fault =.=

Also on TPG
TPG - Same problems here.{{summoner:3}}
Same problem here, I'm with Iprimus

i've managed to log - in hope you guys have the same luck if not i think i might know how to fix it.
-with tpg
Its official folks. TPG DUN GOOFED
Yeah I'm with TPG
TPG also for me. I made it into champ select, then got disconnected. So I've now lost LP as well as not being able to fuel my addiction to this game :(

Same problem here
with tpg
if ti makes you feel any better i cant logon to battle.net and guild wars 2, cant even get onto there websites
All i wanted was just too play some league of legends in peace but it won't let me log in at all.. Sighh
i can log in but i cannot play any game :/i am with Telstra as well

Guys, isn't it obvious? 

It's Teemo...
Freakin devil.
Not sure what causing it, guess it's the servers, Shouldn't of left work early >.> expect servers to be working on probably the busiest night of the week ...
its happening to me too does anyone know wats happening

I'm have the same issue.
Takes numerous attempts to log in and then once in champion selection it times out resulting in a dodge.
So now i dont have any mastery points or any match history hm

It finally let me login, but im scared of playing a game now
.
yeah, just got into a ranked champion select and I've been disconnected from PVP.net, and my internet is fine.
